title: Joker
para: Joker follows Arthur Fleck, a struggling comedian in Gotham City who slowly descends into madness and becomes the infamous Joker. The film explores his loneliness, mental illness, and society’s role in shaping his downfall.

title: joker 2
para: starring Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga. It explores the twisted bond between Arthur Fleck and Harley Quinn through dark themes and surreal musical sequence

title: The Boys
para: the show follows a group of vigilantes, known as The Boys, who aim to expose the truth about The Seven, Vought International's premier superhero team

title: Squid Game
para: The show follows 456 financially distressed individuals who participate in deadly children's games for a chance to win a substantial cash prize.

title: One Piece
para: Luffy sets out on a quest to find the legendary treasure known as the One Piece to become the King of the Pirates

title: Stree 2
para: Stree 2: Sarkate Ka Aatank is a 2024 Indian Hindi-language horror-comedy film directed by Amar Kaushik

title: Peaky Blinders (Shelby)
h2: By Order of the Peaky Blinders
para: Tommy Shelby leads a ruthless gang in post-WWI Birmingham, building a crime empire and facing powerful enemies.

title: Raid 2
para: Based on a true story, a fearless income tax officer raids a corrupt politician's mansion in search of black money.

title: Avengers: Endgame
h2: Avengers Assemble for One Final Battle
para: In a universe shattered by Thanos, the Avengers reunite to undo the snap and restore balance to the world.

title: Animal
h2: A Story of a Troubled Bond
para: A complex emotional drama of a son navigating his violent path to earn the love of his distant father.

title: Avatar
para: A marine on an alien planet becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Johnny English
para: After a sudden attack on MI5, Johnny English, a clumsy yet confident British spy, becomes the country's only spy and must stop a group of international assassins.

title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
para: Fearing the actions of Superman, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of hero it really needs.

title: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
para: An orphaned boy raised by animals in the jungle seizes his destiny while confronting a dangerous enemy.

title: Pushpa: The Rule - Part 2
para: Pushpa's saga continues as he faces new challenges in his quest for dominance in the red sandalwood smuggling underworld.

title: Spider-Man
para: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing paths with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat to all realities.

title: Peaky Blinders
h2: By Order of the Peaky Blinders
para: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.

title: Deadpool 2
h2: The Merc with a Mouth Returns
para: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from a brutal, time-traveling cyborg.

title: Dune: Part One
para: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

title: The Devil's Hour
para: In 1983, financially struggling college student Samantha Hughes takes a strange babysitting job that coincides with a full lunar eclipse. She slowly realizes her clients harbor a terrifying secret.

title: Final Destination: Bloodlines
para: The sixth installment in the Final Destination series, where a new group of individuals must confront Death's design after narrowly escaping a catastrophic event.

title: Dark
para: A German town's sinister past and present intertwine when children start disappearing, revealing a complex time travel conspiracy spanning several generations.

title: Insidious
para: A family seeks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

title: Evil Dead Rise
para: Two estranged sisters' reunion is cut short when flesh-possessing demons thrust them into a primal battle for survival.

title: Darkness
para: A family moves into a house with a dark past, where an ancient evil awaits to unleash terror.

title: Imaginary
para: A woman returns to her childhood home to discover that the imaginary friend she left behind is very real and unhappy that she abandoned him.

title: It
para: Seven young outcasts confront their worst nightmare—an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on their town's children.

title: Talk to Me
para: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits using an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill, until one of them goes too far.

title: Abigail
para: After a group of criminals kidnap the 12-year-old ballerina daughter of a powerful underworld figure, they discover they're locked inside with no ordinary little girl.

title: Jhamkudi
para: A village in Gujarat is cursed by an evil witch named Jhamkudi during Navratri celebrations, leading to a series of haunting events.

title: Oppenheimer
h2: The Father of the Atomic Bomb
para: A biographical drama depicting the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer and his pivotal role in developing the atomic bomb during World War II.

title: RRR
para: A fictional tale of two legendary revolutionaries who embark on a journey away from home to fight for their country in the 1920s.

title: Avatar
para: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
Two British soldiers during World War I are given an impossible mission: deliver a message deep in enemy territory that will stop their own men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: Joker
para: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime.

title: Hridayam
para: The emotional journey of Arun, his carefree bachelor days in engineering college, and how he matures through various phases of life.

title: Shiddat
para: Two parallel love stories, with Jaggi and Kartika's intense passion contrasted against Gautam and Ira's mature relationship, exploring the lengths one can go for love.

title: Sanam Teri Kasam
h2: A Love Story Sealed with a Curse
para: After being disowned by her family, an awkward librarian relies on the help of her brooding neighbor to change her image, leading to an unexpected romance.

title: Sita Ramam
para: An orphan soldier, Lieutenant Ram's life changes after he receives a letter from a girl named Sita. Meeting her, love blossoms amidst the backdrop of war.

title: First Love
para: A poignant look at a young man's difficult entry into adulthood, experiencing the highs and lows of his first love with Ann as they navigate their pending departure to college.

title: One Day
para: Emma and Dexter meet on the night of their university graduation. We see them every year on the anniversary of that date—July 15th—as their lives intertwine and diverge.
